医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
主要研究表明抗凝治疗无法改善中风结果脑部血管中的血栓幸存下来的中风患者在恢复期间很容易出现新的阻塞，即使他们接受了血管清理干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Anti-coagulant-therapy-fails-to-improve-中风-outcomes-in-major-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Anti-coagulant-therapy-fails-to-improve-中风-outcomes-in-major-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eda9a67e-fdb8-4cdf-b6f4-29a975f71102 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 22:33:41 -0400 Anti-coagulant therapy fails to improve stroke outcomes in major study
研究发现镉暴露与白人认知能力下降有关空气、水、食物和土壤中存在的重金属镉已知会导致健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Study-links-cadmium-exposure-to-cognitive-decline-in-white-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Study-links-cadmium-exposure-to-cognitive-decline-in-white-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96af35c6-2671-46a7-81d8-ae4c1ea16842 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 22:25:56 -0400 Study links cadmium exposure to cognitive decline in white individuals
了解前列腺癌进展中的荷尔蒙悖论最近在前列腺癌中发现了一个治疗悖论：阻断睾酮的产生可以阻止早期疾病的肿瘤生长，而提高激素水平可以延缓疾病进展的患者的疾病进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Understanding-the-hormonal-paradox-in-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Understanding-the-hormonal-paradox-in-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee02ddf3-1279-4c08-965a-6f74436be587 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 22:16:00 -0400 Understanding the hormonal paradox in prostate cancer progression
男性健康习惯和关注点的代际差异揭示克利夫兰诊所的一项新的全国调查显示，在男性健康方面，各代人之间存在相似之处和差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Generational-differences-in-mens-health-habits-and-concerns-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Generational-differences-in-mens-health-habits-and-concerns-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eeef96d8-056f-4f8e-843f-8978daea4f4b Wed, 04 Sep 2024 21:54:27 -0400 Generational differences in men's health habits and concerns revealed
研究揭示了月经周期在乳腺组织中传播突变细胞的作用VIB-KU 鲁汶癌症生物学中心、荷兰癌症研究所和 Oncode 研究所以及剑桥大学的一组研究人员发现，与月经周期相关的防御机制在乳腺组织内传播突变细胞中发挥着作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Study-reveals-menstrual-cyclee28099s-role-in-spreading-mutant-cells-in-breast-tissue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Study-reveals-menstrual-cyclee28099s-role-in-spreading-mutant-cells-in-breast-tissue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=053016f9-cbc9-4159-ad67-6ffe15c91563 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 21:49:50 -0400 Study reveals menstrual cycle’s role in spreading mutant cells in breast tissue
与沃尔夫-帕金森-怀特综合征心律失常相关的遗传变异deCODE Genetics/Amgen 的科学家以及丹麦和美国的合作者对心脏辅助传导通路（沃尔夫-帕金森-怀特综合征）的遗传学进行的研究表明，辅助传导通路可导致节律紊乱，其特征是心跳过快，这可能会危及生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Genetic-variants-linked-to-heart-rhythm-disturbances-in-Wolff-Parkinson-White-Syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Genetic-variants-linked-to-heart-rhythm-disturbances-in-Wolff-Parkinson-White-Syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8f55b98-9174-40fa-9b6f-1518dda8f477 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 21:44:56 -0400 Genetic variants linked to heart rhythm disturbances in Wolff-Parkinson-White Syndrome
免疫细胞阻止病毒感染后肺部保护屏障的愈合参与由 Cedars-Sinai 共同领导的一项多中心研究的研究人员发现了一种途径，免疫细胞可以通过这种途径阻止肺部保护屏障在病毒感染（如 COVID-19）后愈合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Immune-cells-prevent-the-lungs-protective-barrier-from-healing-after-viral-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Immune-cells-prevent-the-lungs-protective-barrier-from-healing-after-viral-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9520186-023b-4be1-b32d-956d3747c089 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 21:41:20 -0400 Immune cells prevent the lungs' protective barrier from healing after viral infections
通过甲基化将星形胶质细胞重编程为脑干细胞静息状态的脑干细胞与支持大脑神经细胞的正常星形胶质细胞几乎没有什么区别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Astrologies-reprogrammed-to-brain-stem-cells-through-methylation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Astrologies-reprogrammed-to-brain-stem-cells-through-methylation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a914458-6407-4356-836a-22c9259aa910 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 21:37:12 -0400 Astrocytes reprogrammed to brain stem cells through methylation
脑部扫描揭示抑郁症易感性的隐藏线索通过一年半的时间反复扫描一小群患者的大脑，威尔康奈尔医学研究人员发现了一种独特的神经元相互作用模式，这种模式似乎使一些人容易患上抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Brain-scans-reveal-hidden-clues-to-depression-susceptibility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Brain-scans-reveal-hidden-clues-to-depression-susceptibility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14306f18-7c04-4ea6-bfaa-e4f5d6546808 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 21:28:03 -0400 Brain scans reveal hidden clues to depression susceptibility
OSER1蛋白被发现对长寿有很大影响哥本哈根大学的一项新研究得出结论，事实证明，特定基因对寿命有很大影响。这可能为新的治疗方法铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/OSER1- Protein-found-to-have-great-influence-on-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/OSER1- Protein-found-to-have-great-influence-on-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=334039b7-1895-408f-9355-8f1a8c469c1f Wed, 04 Sep 2024 13:11:00 -0400 OSER1 protein found to have great influence on longevity
